Posts.Content: Oct 23, 2017 05:10PM Concerned4444 wrote: Thank you for responding. I can honestly say that I never really empathized with a survivor before. That is terrible and I'm not proud to admit that

Posts.Content: Oct 30, 2017 10:44PM Concerned4444 wrote: Pink dragon- I had my biopsy today. I will get the results Wednesday. It was not painful at all. It really helped my nerves today. I just have to get through tomorrow and then I will know
